mapper.select: SELECT * FROM TEST
SELECT A.MEM_PWD FROM MEMBER_TBL A WHERE A.MEM_ID = #{ memId }

SELECT A.MEM_CODE , A.EMAIL , A.ADDRESS , A.POST_CODE , A.D_ADDRESS , A.PHONE , A.MEM_TYPE , A.LOCATION_CODE , A.NICKNAME , A.MEM_ID , A.ENROLL_DATE , B.NAME , B.REP_COUNT , C.MEM_CODE , C.ACCOUNT , C.STORE_NO , C.CEO_NAME , D.STORE_IMG , D.STORE_NAME , D.STATUS_YN , E.LAST_LOGIN , E.CODE FROM MEMBER_TBL A LEFT JOIN USER_TBL B ON (A.MEM_CODE = B.MEM_CODE) LEFT JOIN CEO_TBL C ON (A.MEM_CODE = C.MEM_CODE) LEFT JOIN STORE_TBL D ON (A.MEM_CODE = D.MEM_CODE) LEFT JOIN MANAGER_TBL E ON (A.MEM_CODE = E.MEM_CODE) WHERE A.IS_DELETED = 'N' AND A.MEM_ID = #{ memId }
SELECT A.LOCATION_CODE , A.LOCATION_NAME FROM LOCATION A WHERE A.LOCATION_CODE != 'L0'
SELECT A.CATEGORY_CODE , A.CATEGORY_NAME FROM CATEGORY_TBL A

SELECT A.MEM_CODE , A.ADDRESS , A.POST_CODE , A.D_ADDRESS , A.PHONE , A.LOCATION_CODE , A.NICKNAME , B.ACCOUNT , B.STORE_NO , B.CEO_NAME , C.STORE_NAME , C.STORE_IMG , C.STORE_INFO , C.WORK_TIME FROM MEMBER_TBL A LEFT JOIN CEO_TBL B ON(A.MEM_CODE = B.MEM_CODE) LEFT JOIN STORE_TBL C ON(B.MEM_CODE = C.MEM_CODE) WHERE A.IS_DELETED = 'N' AND A.MEM_ID = #{ memId }

SELECT A.MEM_CODE , A.MEM_ID , A.ENROLL_DATE , B.LAST_LOGIN , C.AUTH FROM MEMBER_TBL A LEFT JOIN MANAGER_TBL B ON(A.MEM_CODE = B.MEM_CODE) LEFT JOIN AUTH_TBL C ON (B.CODE = C.CODE) WHERE A.MEM_ID != #{ memId } AND A.MEM_TYPE = 'manager' AND A.IS_DELETED = 'N'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO EMAIL_CODE_TBL ( CODE , MEM_CODE , EMAIL , EMAIL_CODE ) VALUES ( SEQ_CODE.NEXTVAL , null , null , #{ emailCode } )
mapper.select: SELECT CODE FROM ( SELECT CODE FROM EMAIL_CODE_TBL ORDER BY CODE DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM = 1
SELECT MEM_CODE FROM ( SELECT MEM_CODE FROM MEMBER_TBL ORDER BY ENROLL_DATE DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM = 1
SELECT EMAIL FROM ( SELECT EMAIL FROM MEMBER_TBL ORDER BY ENROLL_DATE DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM = 1
SELECT MEM_ID FROM MEMBER_TBL A JOIN USER_TBL B ON(A.MEM_CODE = B.MEM_CODE) WHERE A.EMAIL = #{ email }
SELECT A.TAG_NO , A.TAG , A.STATUS FROM TAGS_TBL A WHERE A.STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT A.SD_CODE , A.SD_IMG , A.SD_NAME , A.SD_DETAIL , A.DISCOUNT_RATE , A.PRICE , A.ORDERABLE_STATUS , A.MEM_CODE , A.VOLUME , B.STORE_NAME FROM PRODUCT_TBL A JOIN STORE_TBL B ON(A.MEM_CODE = B.MEM_CODE) WHERE A.ORDERABLE_STATUS = 'Y' AND A.IS_DELETED = 'N'
SELECT A.HOT_NO AS TAG_NO , A.HOT_CONTENT AS TAG FROM HOT_TBL A

SELECT A.MEM_CODE , A.STORE_NAME , A.STORE_IMG , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM STORE_TBL S LEFT JOIN REVIEW_TBL R ON(S.MEM_CODE = R.MEM_CODE)) AS COUNT FROM STORE_TBL A LEFT JOIN MEMBER_TBL M ON(A.MEM_CODE = M.MEM_CODE) WHERE M.IS_DELETED = 'N' ORDER BY M.ENROLL_DATE DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE MANAGER_TBL SET LAST_LOGIN = SYSTIMESTAMP WHERE MEM_CODE = (SELECT MEM_CODE FROM MEMBER_TBL WHERE MEM_ID = #{ memId })
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM RT_NOTICE_TBL WHERE MEM_CODE = #{ memCode }
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM RT_NOTICE_TBL WHERE NOTICE_CODE = #{ noticeCode }
